definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: The taxi that towed us to the nearest town was just as bad.
sentences.chinese: 那辆拖着我们到最近市镇的的士同样破破烂烂。

sentences.english: It was rare, she said, rifling through a patient's tattered record.
sentences.chinese: 这是少有的，她说，通过病人的破烂的纪录膛线。

sentences.english: Their gray uniforms were worn beyond the point of shabbiness.
sentences.chinese: 他们灰色的制服已经破烂不堪。

sentences.english: Under the broken birdhouse a mouse plays with a nibble of yesterday's bread.
sentences.chinese: 破烂的鸟舍中一只老鼠啃着昨天的面包。

sentences.english: One day, the youth that came to wearing junk, do obeisance to division into the door.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，来了一个穿着破烂的年轻人，进门拜师。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:There are a lot of shacks in the run-down part of the town near the railroad.
sentences.chinese: 这城市的落后地区，有许多破烂的小木屋在铁路附近。

sentences.english: By this time, Tungse's clothes were in rags.
sentences.chinese: 这时候，东子的衣服已经破烂不堪了。

sentences.english: A stone wall trails raggedly through the woods.
sentences.chinese: 一条破烂的石墙穿过树林。

sentences.english: The ragged hem of her under-tunic was stained with it.
sentences.chinese: 她破烂束腰内衣上的卷边沾满了血。

sentences.english: There are lots of bag ladies at Central Park.
sentences.chinese: 纽约中央公园里有许多露宿街头，捡破烂的“女人”。

sentences.english: His gloves has been the worse for wear.
sentences.chinese: 他的手套已戴得破烂不堪了。

sentences.english: We demolished/razed/pulled down/knocked down/toppled down/tore down/got rid of the old worn-out school houses.
sentences.chinese: 我们淘汰了已经破烂不堪的旧校舍。

sentences.english: Her father had died in a rundown, blacks-only Dallas hospital ward.
sentences.chinese: 她的父亲死在黑人专许的达拉斯医院的破烂病房里。

sentences.english: For one thing, he took command of a ragged army of revolutionaries.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他勇敢地出任一支破破烂烂的革命军的司令。

sentences.english: His clothes were torn to rags.

definition: see 灰不溜丟|灰不溜丢[hui1 bu5 liu1 diu1]
shapeless/deformed/ruined/beyond recognition/(of a person) reduced to a shadow
messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
